[enemygroup]
# 2 Skeleton Mages
type=skeletonmage
location=21,9,6,2
level=2,2
number=2,2

[enemygroup]
# 3 Firebats
type=firebat
location=14,20,5,5
level=2,2
number=3,3

[event]
# Teleport to Volcano3
type=on_trigger
location=0,22,1,8
intermap=volcano3.txt,30,9

[event]
# Ghost Talisman
type=run_once
location=23,7,1,1
hotspot=location
loot=400,24,6,fixed,1
msg=Someone has scrawled here: "The fire skeleton's bombs killed my friend instantly!  If I wasn't a ghost already, I'd have died, too."
requires_not_status=ghosttalis
tooltip=Altar
